scripts.dev: yarn gen_ec_keys && ts-node-dev -r dotenv/config -r tsconfig-paths/register index.ts
scripts.start: yarn gen_ec_keys && npm run build && TS_NODE_PROJECT=dist/tsconfig.json node -r tsconfig-paths/register ./dist/index.js
scripts.gen_ec_keys: openssl ecparam -genkey -name prime256v1 -noout -out ec_private.pem && openssl ec -in ec_private.pem -pubout -out ec_public.pem
